text:
(1)
Burling Slip, west from but not including South, to and including Pearl Streets, showing the power plant of the New York Steam Co. at the S.W. corner of Water Street and beyond it the 35-story office building, at the S.W. corner of John and Pearl Streets, bearing Nos. 116-120 John Street. The 10-story building in the centre of the view is at the N.W. corner of Front Street bearing Nos. 21 Burling Slip and 182 Front Street.
March 27, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same at a later date. Note the Woolworth Building in the right background.
May 2, 1933.

P. L. Sperr.

(3)
The same, another view.
May 2, 1933.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Manhattan: Burling Slip - Between South and Pearl Streets.
